mjcgraph
========

**mjcgraph** is a Python library for creating, traversing and visualising
graphs. It was inspired by the 2022 Advent Of Code and by the Algorithms
course <https://algs4.cs.princeton.edu/home/> by Robert Sedgewick.

.. note::

   This is a test/hobby project under unpredictable development.
